text: is anyone else feeling gaslit all the time lately? I'm wearing my mask everywhere I go, I don't touch it, I don't pull it down, I go out once every few weeks for supplies only. and then I see folks not wearing masks at all, throwing big house parties, and it makes me feel insane.
